roleset.name: emit in bubbly fashion

example.name: bubble forth
example.text: The heart of this great poet constantly bubbles forth a generous joy of life -- with or without the guitar''.
example.arg: The heart of this great poet

example.name: bubble over
example.text: Pat meanwhile was bubbling over with sentiment.

example.name: bubble out
example.text: Sweat bubbled out on Jess's swarthy face.

example.name: just bubble
example.text: Reaching for an old clay pot, relic of pioneer days, he tore the envelope in pieces, dropping them into it, touching the little pyre to flame, watching it curl, the red sealing wax melting and bubbling in the feathery ash.

roleset.note: Trying to avoid a proliferation of rolesets.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'bubble' based on sentences in brown.
